Name

VixSnapshot_GetParent

Description

VixError
VixSnapshot_GetParent(VixHandle snapshotHandle,
                      VixHandle *parentSnapshotHandle);

This function returns the parent of a snapshot.

Parameters

snapshotHandle
A snapshot handle.
parentSnapshotHandle
(output) A handle to the parent of the specified snapshot.

Return Value

VixError

Remarks

  • If you pass a root snapshot handle as the first parameter, then this function will return VIX_OK and set parentSnapshotHandle to VIX_INVALID_HANDLE.
  • This function is not supported when using the VIX_SERVICEPROVIDER_VMWARE_PLAYER host type.

Side Effects

None.

Requirements

vix.h, since VMware Workstation 6.0
